BackEnd

Class GameLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • BackEnd.GameLogic

  • public class GameLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the flow of game, lets the UI know what choices the player has and the state of the game. Also lets the UI tell it the User choices, basically acts and an API for the front end.
    Author:
    Christian Sanger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameLogic(int seed)
      Creates an empty game logic class, must run startNew or load before you can play.

      • getSlideLocations

        public java.util.ArrayList<Coordinate> getSlideLocations()
                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        gets the current slide locations that the player can push a tile in. All slide locations will be outside of board. ie. to push in from the left to the right on the top row location (-1,0) would be used.
        Returns:
        list of every allowed slide location
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
